item.title: Simple [pi] question

@i0wn3v3ry wrote:

case 6282:
if(c.playerRights >= 0) {
c.getItems().playerHasItem(8851, 300);
c.getItems().deleteItem2(8851, amount of tokens to delete);
c.getPA().movePlayer(2842, 3540, 2);
c.sendMessage(“Fight the cyclops for a chance of a defender drop!”);
}else {
c.sendMessage(“You need more tokens to teleport”);
return;
}

item.title: Simple [pi] question
item.dc:creator: @Code_kai Code kai
item.description:
@Code_kai wrote:

I’m trying to make it so that you need a certain amount of tokens to enter a portal.

Here’s the snippet from actionhandler.java

case 6282:
		if(c.playerRights >= 0) {
                        c.getPA().movePlayer(2842, 3540, 2);
                        }
                        else if(c.playerRights >= 0) {
                        c.sendMessage("Fight the Cyclops for a chance of a defender drop !");
			getItem(8851, 300);
                        }
                break;

Can you tell me the error as I get this when I compile.

src\server\model\players\ActionHandler.java:264: cannot find symbol
symbol : method getItem(int,int)
location: class server.model.players.ActionHandler
getItem(8851, 300):

?

Read full topic
